title: Japanese Cinema Encyclopedia - The Sex Films - 1st Ed - Gooner
description:
Publisher: Vital Books, U.S. (July 1998)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1889288527
ISBN-13: 978-1889288529

Reviews Japanese pink films, a unique genre that may be Japan's most important contribution to world cinema. Focus is on movies from major studios and distributors over the past four decades. Many of these films realistically portray S&M sex, rape, and violence, yet are accepted as escapist entert
